name: Middle Management (Eggchanted)
description:
Hello! Welcome to our humble stage! 

Do you consider yourself a natural-born leader?  Would you say you have a knack for organisation? Are you a team player through and through?

Well come join our game as a new role in our theatre's Middle Management has just opened up! Will you land the career path or will you be fired the first day on the job?  Bring your wits, make the right choices, and put on an unforgettable show! 

Get ready for a balancing act!
